title: Radieschen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Take-out, European, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This is the former "Oelweide" Biobistro. Food is vegan-friendly with each day 2 Mediterranean soups which are always vegan. Plus has salads with house-made dressing and tofu as topping option. Soy milk and fresh juices available.
